default.text: Do you want senior marketing input without the overhead associated with hiring a full-time CMO? This is where I come in. 50% of my time goes to small companies and the remaining 50% to mid-sized ones. As your part-time CMO, I dive in and your business,

Find out what problems you are facing in generating products and new leads. Then I create a marketing strategy and execute it in a systematic way. I work with you for hours every week to help you build the marketing department you've always wanted.
I do this by executing strategic marketing that attracts, educates and then converts your target customers
